channel.title: "Split Chat" Need help to fix it! Please
channel.description: Hello now have i try to fix my split chat thing for a while and still dont work.. it doesnt shows in blue in the screen it just keep be in chat box :/ Can some 1 help me? :P (Edit) I fixed it by myself (had just wrong cases...)
